Pre-Game Insights: The Utah Jazz host the Memphis Grizzlies for the season opener on Wednesday, 9 p.m. EDT, with the Grizzlies favored by a 3-point line and an over/under of 227.5 points combined.
Others: The Jazz finished the 2023-24 season with a 31-51 overall record and 21-20 at home, while the Grizzlies finished 27-55 overall. The Jazz allowed 120.5 points per game last season, and the Grizzlies averaged 105.8 points per game while allowing 112.8 points per game.
